description: [LoFiSe](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1101) can collect all the files from the working directory every three hours and place them into a password-protected archive for further exfiltration.(Citation: Kaspersky ToddyCat Check Logs October 2023)

external_references.description: Dedola, G. et al. (2023, October 12). ToddyCat: Keep calm and check logs. Retrieved January 3, 2024.
